.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AtomicBoolean extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.ISerializable, class System.IDisposable
type AtomicBoolean = class inherit Object interface ISerializable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: A boolean value that may be updated atomically.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CompareAndExchange (bool expectedValue, bool newValue);
.method public hidebysig instance bool CompareAndExchange(bool expectedValue, bool newValue) cil managed

Docs.summary: Atomically sets the value to newValue if the current value, referred to as the witness value, == expectedValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle#compareAndExchange.
Docs.returns: the witness value, which will be the same as the expected value if successful
